scripts.start:server_full: cd server && npm run prisma-deploy && npm run prisma-seed && npm run start:dist
scripts.start-standalone:frontend: ./wait-for-it.sh -s 127.0.0.1:4466 -- cross-env DEBUG=botium* PRISMA_ENDPOINT=http://127.0.0.1:4466/box/standalone PRISMA_SECRET=mysecret123 JWT_SECRET=jwtsecret123 BOTIUMBOX_QUEUE_REDISURL=redis://127.0.0.1:6379 npm start
scripts.start-standalone:frontend:docker: HOST_IP=`/sbin/ip route|awk '/default/ { print $3 }'` && ./wait-for-it.sh -t 300 -s $HOST_IP:4466 -- cross-env DEBUG=botium* PRISMA_ENDPOINT=http://$HOST_IP:4466/box/standalone PRISMA_SECRET=mysecret123 JWT_SECRET=jwtsecret123 BOTIUMBOX_QUEUE_REDISURL=redis://$HOST_IP:6379 npm start
scripts.docker:publish-standalone: docker push botium/botium-box-ce:standalone-$npm_package_version && docker tag botium/botium-box-ce:standalone-$npm_package_version botium/botium-box-ce:latest && docker push botium/botium-box-ce:latest
scripts.docker:publish-box: docker push botium/botium-box-ce:box-$npm_package_version && docker tag botium/botium-box-ce:box-$npm_package_version botium/botium-box-ce:box-latest && docker push botium/botium-box-ce:box-latest
